Text.Page:
One of the great tragedies of this region is the corruption of the fey creatures. The jalmaraks, in particular, were valuable guardians of the woods. Now, they're a danger to all.

For our sake, and theirs, kill the {@LinkCreature:28#3051#tainted jalmaraks} in the region. Everyone will be safer for it.

Jalmaraks are fascinating creatures and astonishingly loyal guardians. Faeries, in particular, have an affinity with them.

Alas, these creatures are dead but it's for the best. They were savage shadows of their former selves.
